Package com.soen343.backend.api

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
com.soen343.backend.api.UserController
@RestController
public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
Controller for all User Operations for Requests to the Application Frontend

  • Method Details

    • addUser

      @PostMapping("api/user/addUser") public void addUser​(@Valid @NonNull @RequestBody @Valid User user)
      A Request to add a new user with a new id to the database list
      Parameters:
      user - A User object to create and add to the database list

    • getAllUsers

      @GetMapping("api/user/allUserRetrieval") public java.util.List<User> getAllUsers()
      A Getter for all users stored in the database list
      Returns:
      A List of all users that are currently register

    • getUserById

      @GetMapping("api/user/userRetrieval/{id}") public User getUserById​(@PathVariable("id") java.util.UUID id)
      Getter for a single user identified by a unique Id
      Parameters:
      id - unique id passed in the request mapping to identify the user to find
      Returns:
      The User mapped to the unique Id

    • deleteUserById

      @DeleteMapping("api/user/userRemoval/{id}") public void deleteUserById​(@PathVariable("id") java.util.UUID id)
      Request to remove the specified user from the database list
      Parameters:
      id - unique id passed in the request mapping to identify the user to remove

    • updateUserById

      @PutMapping("api/user/userUpdate/{id}") public void updateUserById​(@PathVariable("id") java.util.UUID id, @Valid @NonNull @RequestBody @Valid User userToUpdate)
      Updated the User Specified in the path
      Parameters:
      id - unique id passed in the request mapping to identify the user
      userToUpdate - User Model of the updated User

    • loginUser

      @PutMapping("api/user/logIn/{id}") public void loginUser​(@PathVariable("id") java.util.UUID id)
      Logs in the user specified in the path
      Parameters:
      id - unique id passed in the request mapping to identify the user to log in

    • setUserLocation

      @PutMapping("api/user/updateUserLocation/{id}/{location}") public void setUserLocation​(@PathVariable("id") java.util.UUID id, @PathVariable("location") java.lang.String location)

      Parameters:
      id - unique id passed in the request mapping to identify the user to update the location of
